InstallÂ¶

  1. Install the cli utilities
npm install @seatbelt/cli -g
  1. Create a new project
seatbelt --new [dirname]
  1. Pick a server and orm on creation of a new project
  2. Enter the directory and run the index.js
cd [dirname]
node index.js
